text: Ricardo Domínguez (20 July 1985 - 22 February 2017), nicknamed Pelón, was a Mexican professional boxer. He fought in the light welterweight division. He was best known for having won the 2009 Campeón Azteca tournament at lightweight. After 50 bouts, he won 37 of them. He was born in Culiacán, Sinaloa. Dominguez died from colon cancer on 22 February 2017, at the age of 31. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Mexican boxers Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:People from Sinaloa
title: Ricardo Domínguez
